html:
12.10.20  12:59 pm   You always say it'll be released as a video and as just the song. Have you considered releasing just the video (without the song) as well?

      no

12.10.20  11:09 pm   How many times has the game changed so far

      too many to count. every time you count it it changes even more

12.10.20  10:15 am   Hey bill what was your favorite song to write

      i would prefer to write a new one to be my favorite

12.10.20  9:05 am   what are jazz chords 

      regular chords

12.10.20  8:37 am   What inspires you?

      everything

12.10.20  7:26 am   Was the beginning of la de da de day oh about how you wanted to make unconventional music?

     i've always wanted to make many different kinds of music

      The 2+2 has been 4 for so many darn years part referring to a boredom with popular music?

     no

     Your songs are so full of meaning, and I was just wondering if this one might just be on point.

     i love popular music. possibly i was frustrated with my inability to make songs, despite feeling like i had already known how for many years

12.10.20  6:03 am   why is cantaloupe so damn orange

      to blow your mind

12.10.20  5:39 am   what makes a song good?

      you

12.10.20  4:25 am   Fuck questions I want some answers

      i know what you mean

12.10.20  3:33 am   is christmas still real?

      yes, despite its best efforts to be fake

12.10.20  2:33 am   WHat is holding you bacc from releasing tHE *TOP MEGA SECRET AMAZHING* project that you're holding back from releasing lmfao

      i'm doing a music video, which is not necessarily top secret nor amazing, but, what is currently holding me back from releasing that is it's not done yet

12.10.20  1:21 am   I like your music but I don't always understand it. Am I supposed to?

      no one understands music

12.10.20  12:57 am   what is the best work of literature arts in your opinion?

      still searching for a good one

12.10.20  12:03 am   Thoughts on airplanes?

      i'm impressed

12.10.20  12:01 am   What is the strangest place you've been in while writing a song?

      earth

12.9.20  11:47 pm   Will the next song have a 19/8 time signature?

      no

12.9.20  11:35 pm   should i start drinking water more often?

      yes

12.9.20  10:54 pm   Is Colgate a name, the name of Col who owns a gate, or Col. Gate?

      it's a name now, but, centuries ago it might have been derived from something else. and over that period of time the spelling might have changed also

12.9.20  10:25 pm   can you always follow the lyrics when you listen to a song?

     no

      for a lot of them i have to see them written down because i can't. got any tips?

     no. this is the artist's fault

     by the way thanks for making lyrics part of your music videos, dunno if helping with that was the intent but it's very convenient

12.9.20  9:52 pm   when people sing your songs its like you putting words on their mouths, isn't it?

      no, i just offer the words. it is their choice whether to accept

12.9.20  9:44 pm   Turns out I might not want the things I thought I wanted, and now that I don't want those things, I don't know what I want. What now?

      take a walk, if you can

12.9.20  9:10 pm   how do you manage all the ideas that come from your head?

     i try to write them down

     you've mentioned before that your brain doesn't really have the infinity warning, so is there any way that you try to correct for this after the fact?

      maybe

12.9.20  8:35 pm   do you agree with the following quote?

"A process cannot be understood by stopping it. Understanding must move with the flow of the process, must join it and flow with it."

      i can't agree or disagree unless i know more of the context where it was said

12.9.20  8:10 pm   What's the longest part of the making of your upcoming video ? The 3D software, the song itself or something else ?

      my brain eating itself

12.9.20  7:49 pm   I want to make videos but all I have is iMovie. Should I try to use that

     yes

      or wait till I can afford something better?

      no

12.9.20  6:54 pm   I saw someone ask what your sad glad and mad scheme was, and you told them that said scheme was to explain another scheme.

     that's not true

     What is this scheme that you are scheming to explain?

     in that context, it was the one they mentioned. however, i will not let that stop me from explaining other schemes as well

12.9.20  6:16 pm   what is it like to be sung by a song?

      it's sort of a tingly feeling

12.9.20  6:15 pm   how can i do the same thing everyday without getting bored?

      do it in a different........... ~way~

12.9.20  6:06 pm   Dose it really take over a year to make a song?

      no

12.9.20  5:48 pm   How do you explain the sudden appearance of the Mac icons 10 seconds into your first Monday video?

      luckily i don't have to explain that because it didn't happen

12.9.20  5:10 pm   Whenever someone asks about your new songs do you just copy and paste the same sentence?

      no

12.9.20  4:12 pm   are you a god?

      i thought you were

12.9.20  4:06 pm   Is there any sort of F#/Gb chord in the song you are currently producing?

      not really. i should clarify, i'm not producing the song right now, the song has been done for a while. i'm producing the video for it

12.9.20  4:03 pm   What are you working on right now

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

12.9.20  3:08 pm   How did you learn how to make such unique music?

     venturing about the world

      Did you get taught things by people?

     sometimes

     Did you teach yourself? 

     sometimes

12.9.20  3:00 pm   are you mentally sane bill?

      .....getting there

12.9.20  2:59 pm   what's the 22nd chord of your next song?

      G

12.9.20  2:28 pm   Do all your videos have any meaning?

     yes

     or are they all completely random?

     no

     either way I think they are pretty genius!

12.9.20  2:13 pm   12.8.20  12:33 am Is there a reason for that capital F? 

      yes, sometimes i use a capital letter at the beginning of a sentence to help separate it visually from the previous sentence

12.9.20  2:08 pm   When do you think you're gonna be finished the next video?

      i don't know

12.9.20  2:05 pm   why do you state that you are so many different things, and if it is the case that you are those things, why are you so many different things

      this may be to distract from how few things i actually am

12.9.20  2:01 pm   What did Damien Maymdien skip in the "maybe i could blades of grass" video?

      the plot

12.9.20  1:44 pm   Did ball & stick have anything to do with scientific curriculum?

      no

12.9.20  12:27 pm   how do you try to preserve the feeling of being in an environment that is full of love, even when it is not?

      you wanna go ahead and begin communicating

12.9.20  12:00 pm   you have answered what is a tree.

     are you sure

     now explain WHY is a tree

      to set a good example, for future generations

12.9.20  11:40 am   When you're writing a song, do you usually start with a basic chord structure that goes with the melody, and then arrange it rhythmically and 'texturally',

     mostly yes

      or do you kinda hear the whole package from the start?

     also yes

     I know it probably depends but I'm curious. Thanks!

12.9.20  11:19 am   If I poured honey and peanuts into a bowl of normal cheerios, are they now honey nut cheerios?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.9.20  10:58 am   Tell us what your next video is and I will give you a cookie

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

12.9.20  10:20 am   Are you currently working on any projects or anything else like that?

      yes

12.9.20  9:03 am   were you at an airport terminal when you wrote the song "airport terminal"

      no
